channel.title: Relive 317: REAL economy, Recreating memories!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://s21.postimg.org/gc7t0tpon/Relive.png[/img][/CENTER]
[U][B]What we have to offer: [/B][/U] - 99.9% uptime. - Weekly updates. - No resets garuanteed, with our backup systems! - Community driven server. - A great economy, where all your items will be actually worth something.
[B][U]Economy:[/U][/B] At Relive we strive for the best economy for everyone. Gaining money on Relive will depend on what YOU like the most. Do you like skilling? Or do you want to kill monsters? No problem, relive's unique economy concept makes everything worth your time. No skilling without getting paid for it ofcourse!
[B][U]Combat:[/U][/B] - 100% perfect runescape hit formula's. - Perfect player versus monsters. - Perfect magic - Perfect ranging - All special attacks working
[B][U]Website:[/U][/B] [url=http://www.reliveserver.com]www.reliveserver.com[/url] [B][U]Webclient:[/U][/B] [url=http://www.reliveserver.com/play.html]www.reliveserver.com/play.html[/url] [B][U]Help us grow![/U][/B] [url=http://www.reliveserver.com/vote.php]www.reliveserver.com/vote.php[/url]

thanks!

item.title: Relive 317: REAL economy, Recreating memories!
item.dc:creator: @reliveserver reliveserver
item.description:
@reliveserver wrote:

Soulcist:

Well I don’t see much that would attract me and would make me continue to play but I wish for the best. And should find another theme, that one is so over-used.

Thanks for your advice.

Read full topic

item.title: Relive 317: REAL economy, Recreating memories!
item.dc:creator: @reliveserver reliveserver
item.description:
@reliveserver wrote:

[CENTER][/CENTER]

[U][B]What we have to offer:
[/B][/U]

  • 99.9% uptime.
  • Weekly updates.
  • No resets garuanteed, with our backup systems!
  • Community driven server.
  • A great economy, where all your items will be actually worth something.

[B][U]Economy:[/U][/B]
At Relive we strive for the best economy for everyone. Gaining money on Relive will depend on what YOU like the most.
Do you like skilling? Or do you want to kill monsters? No problem, relive’s unique economy concept makes everything worth your time. No skilling without getting paid for it ofcourse!

[B][U]Combat:[/U][/B]

  • 100% perfect runescape hit formula’s.
  • Perfect player versus monsters.
  • Perfect magic
  • Perfect ranging
  • All special attacks working

[B][U]Website:[/U][/B] www.reliveserver.com
[B][U]Webclient:[/U][/B] www.reliveserver.com/play.html
[B][U]Help us grow![/U][/B] www.reliveserver.com/vote.php
